alert.note: Alert for Erie; Genesee; Monroe; Niagara; Orleans (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 16 at 8:35PM EDT until April 16 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Buffalo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Erie County in western New York... Northeastern Niagara County in western New York... Orleans County in western New York... Monroe County in western New York... Genesee County in western New York... * Until 930 PM EDT. * At 834 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lockport to 6 miles northeast of Akron to Darien Lakes State Park, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Rochester, Greece, Irondequoit, Chili, Batavia, Brockport, Medina, Albion, Hilton and Brighton. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 47 and 48A. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
